title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4602 - Licenses to Conduct Games of Chance: Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4602 - Licenses to Conduct Games of Chance: Applications

State Regulations
§ 4602.1 - Form for application
§ 4602.2 - Premises to be used for conduct of games of chance
§ 4602.3 - Where application is filed
§ 4602.4 - Conditions for accepting application
§ 4602.5 - License register
§ 4602.6 - Reinstatement of license
§ 4602.7 - Refund of license fee
§ 4602.8 - Cancelled license periods
§ 4602.9 - Members listed on application for license
§ 4602.10 - Penalties for underage participation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4602

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§101, 104[1], [19], 128; Executive Law, art. 19-B, § 435; General Municipal Law, arts. 9-A, 14-H, §§ 186, 188-a, 190-a; L. 1976, ch. 960

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
